title: ACT Plugin Schema
description: A schema to validate a FFXIV ACT Overlay for the XIV Resource Registry project.

author.description: The ACT Overlay author's name which should match their author metadata filename.

name.description: The name of the ACT Overlay.

source_type.description: The type of source code repository.

source_url.description: The URL to the source code repository for the ACT Overlay.
